text: Superchick, originally known as Superchic[k], was an American Christian rock/alternative pop band that debuted in 1999 and disbanded in 2013. ==Genres== Their music incorporated various styles such as pop, punk, rock, rap, and R&B.; Their sound has been compared to mainstream artists like No Doubt and Avril Lavigne only with a heavier sound. ==Performance== Five of their songs reached no. 1 on music charts, and their song Stand in the Rain held the No. 1 spot for nine weeks on R&R; Christian Hit Radio (CHR) chart in 2006/2007. ==Related pages== * Pvris * Flyleaf * Paramore * Evanescence Category:American rock bands
title: Superchick
